CustomField.description: Added for location calculation - this will allow comparison of contact location to other data such as user location, and return distance. It also allows mapping. It stores Latitude and Longitude in decimal form.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: SF Geolocation data field - This will allow comparison of contact location to other data such as user location, and return distance. It also allows mapping. It stores Latitude and Longitude in decimal form.
CustomField.label: Location
